articles.description: All the reaction & latest football news with Pep Guardiola set to stay on as Man City boss for at least one more year.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Man City manager extends contract - reaction

articles.description: With Pep Guardiola deciding to stay at Manchester City for at least another season, BBC Sport looks at the challenges ahead for the club.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Manchester City challenges facing manger after signing contract extension

articles.description: Rafael Nadal retires from professional tennis after a 23-year career like no other. On a night of gratitude and grief, Spain led the world in saying "Gracias Rafa".
articles.title: Rafael Nadal retires: What the 22-time Grand Slam champion means to Spain

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at the rise in racism towards East and South East Asian players and fans in football.
articles.title: Bentancur & Son: Racism against East and South East asian players is on the rise

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at five talking points from the Premier League as the international break ends.
articles.title: Premier League returns: Five talking points for English top-flight weekend

articles.description: BBC World Service's World Football has been uncovering the story behind the iconic photo of Brandi Chastain and the impact it had on women's football.
articles.title: Brandi Chastain: The story behind iconic photo of USA's World Cup win

articles.description: Japan's players say that former England coach Eddie Jones' turbo-charged game plan is beginning to emerge on the pitch.
articles.title: England v Japan: Eddie Jones' warp speed plan to win at Twickenham

articles.description: Lautaro Martinez moves level with Diego Maradona in the all-time Argentina scoring charts in a 1-0 World Cup qualifying win over Peru in Buenos Aires.
articles.title: Argentina 1-0 Peru: Lautaro Martinez equals Diego Maradona record in win

articles.description: Warren Gatland says he has a strong desire to remain as Wales head coach as he prepares to face world champions South Africa on Saturday.
articles.title: Warren Gatland: Wales coach wants to stay despite record defeats

articles.description: Uefa award Romania a 3-0 win after opponents Kosovo walked off the pitch in protest at alleged discriminatory chanting by the home fans.
articles.title: Romania awarded 3-0 win after Kosovo walk-off
